item.title: magick
item.description: library(magick) ## Linking to ImageMagick 6.9.9.14 ## Enabled features: cairo, freetype, fftw, ghostscript, lcms, pango, rsvg, webp ## Disabled features: fontconfig, x11 library(magrittr) image_read("https://jeroen.github.io/images/birds.jpg") image_read("https://jeroen.github.io/images/birds.jpg")%>%image_crop('1200x300+100+1700')%>%image_ocr()%>%cat() ## H Grenveld. del Watherby & 0Â° ## CLIMACTERIS PICUMNUS. ## (BROWN TREE CREEPER).

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
